messages.title: Concern About Government Direction
messages.content: Like many people I’ve spoken to, I am deeply concerned about the direction our country is heading under this extreme Conservative government.

messages.title: Heartless Cuts
messages.content: Heartless cuts to our already underfunded NHS and schools are leaving many fearful for their future.

messages.title: Vote to Stand Up to Theresa May
messages.content: Please use your vote to help me stand up to Theresa May and provide the strong voice we need to fight against heartless cuts to vital public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: If re-elected on June 8th, I will fight day in, day out to deliver the investment our NHS and schools desperately need.

mentions.candidate: As your MP, I secured much-needed extra funding for vital public services.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Many lifelong Labour supporters have told me of their dismay over Jeremy Corbyn’s repeated failure to stand up to Theresa May.

issues.education: Heartless cuts to our already underfunded NHS and schools are leaving many fearful for their future.
issues.government: I am deeply concerned about the direction our country is heading under this extreme Conservative government.
issues.health: Heartless cuts to our already underfunded NHS and schools are leaving many fearful for their future.
issues.labourEmployment: Local families shouldn’t have to worry about increasing NHS waiting times or whether their child’s favourite teacher or teaching assistant might be losing their job.

community.content: When local families needed them most, they’ve been too busy infighting to stop Conservative cuts that are threatening local people’s futures.

politicalExperience.achievements: I secured much-needed extra funding for vital public services.

contactInformation.address: 15 Ronald Rolph Court, Wadloes Road, Cambridge CB5 8PX

examples: If re-elected on June 8th, I will fight day in, day out to deliver the investment our NHS and schools desperately need.
Like many people I’ve spoken to, I am deeply concerned about the direction our country is heading under this extreme Conservative government.
Heartless cuts to our already underfunded NHS and schools are leaving many fearful for their future.
Local families shouldn’t have to worry about increasing NHS waiting times or whether their child’s favourite teacher or teaching assistant might be losing their job.
Please use your vote to help me stand up to Theresa May and provide the strong voice we need to fight against heartless cuts to vital public services.
Many lifelong Labour supporters have told me of their dismay over Jeremy Corbyn’s repeated failure to stand up to Theresa May.
Local families shouldn’t have to worry about increasing NHS waiting times or whether their child’s favourite teacher or teaching assistant might be losing their job.
Like many people I’ve spoken to, I am deeply concerned about the direction our country is heading under this extreme Conservative government.
Heartless cuts to our already underfunded NHS and schools are leaving many fearful for their future.
Please use your vote to help me stand up to Theresa May and provide the strong voice we need to fight against heartless cuts to vital public services.
When local families needed them most, they’ve been too busy infighting to stop Conservative cuts that are threatening local people’s futures.
I am deeply concerned about the direction our country is heading under this extreme Conservative government.
Heartless cuts to our already underfunded NHS and schools are leaving many fearful for their future.
Many lifelong Labour supporters have told me of their dismay over Jeremy Corbyn’s repeated failure to stand up to Theresa May.
Many lifelong Labour supporters have told me of their dismay over Jeremy Corbyn’s repeated failure to stand up to Theresa May.
